description: Urgent Data Center Operations request for a UPS repair ( Proposition and Inquiry Number: SSC-UR-0002322, and contract number: SSC-TC-17020318 )
tags: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
### Urgent Data Center Operations Request for UPS Repair

#### Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** SSC-23-00022017:T
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM018314/22017
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 27, 2023, at 2 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, 13th Floor Ottawa, Ontario K1G 4A8, CANADA
	+ Phone: 613 324 4061
	+ Email: raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca
	+ Fax: (613) 960-6007

#### Tender Description

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is issuing an urgent request for data center operations to repair a UPS (Uninterruptible Power Supply) system. Suppliers are required to submit their bids by February 27, 2023.

#### Important Details

* **Due date:** February 27, 2023, at 2 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* **Bid submission:** Suppliers are required to submit their bids electronically through SSC's procurement system
* **Inquiries:** Suppliers can inquire about the tender by emailing raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca

#### Market Access and Trade Agreements

* **Market access:** The contract is open to all suppliers who meet the eligibility criteria for procurement under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Trade agreements:** The contract is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Notice and Attachments

* **Tender notice:** The tender notice and attachments are available online through the Shared Services Canada procurement system

We've kept it concise, always including the tender deadline.

#### Attachments
 Download the request from [here](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/B8B36D89-64E0-4597-A0F0-96370E57B486) and [here](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/B49EBFCE-39EE-4D69-B849-6519BA9411FD)

Original Entry navigation, Timestamp, and measurements have been removed and replaced with a concise description. Also
